pkgmetadata.longdescription: =======================Core Explore Common App=======================Base exploration function for the curator core project.Quick start===========1. Add "core_explore_common_app" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting---------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'core_explore_common_app', ]2. Include the core_explore_common_app URLconf in your project urls.py----------------------------------------------------------------------.. code:: python url(r'^explore/common/', include('core_explore_common_app.urls')),
